name: fantasy-mmorpg-monorepo
description: A scalable fantasy MMORPG with Node.js API, Next.js frontend, and Go game server

scripts.build:gameserver: cd packages/gameserver && go build -o gameserver cmd/server/main.go
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/api && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd packages/api && npx prisma migrate dev
